title: Sky Battles (Alpha)
description:
Sky Battles  (Alpha version) 

The game is currently free on Desura, but requires the Desura downloader to be installed on your PC.

Sky Battles Deadly caves... Massive robotic beasts... Fire breathing dragons... Fly your plane and battle ruthless mechanical enemies in ten fantasy settings. Single player mode requires players to capture gems and destroy targets before advancing. Multiplayer has you battle against enemy opponents online. Choose a world in the lobby and show everyone who's boss. Air combat with emphasis on strategy and skill. Do you prefer to silence your enemies with stealth or do you prefer laying air mines? Find out in this 3D air combat shooter. 

I recommend playing in fullscreen mode as there are a few 
issues playing this with mouse in windowed mode.

To end the game just press the Alt + F4 keys together.

This apha version has 2 single, & 5 multi player levels.

Engine:             Unity
Dev:                Magneticstudio1
Genre:              Arcade
Controls:           Keyboard / Mouse

No controller support yet, but you can always use Xpadder.

Note: This contains both 32, & 64 bit games.
I have not tested this on Windows 8.1
